thread.title: Gigi Hadid opens up about her first date with Zayn Malik
thread.title_full: Gigi Hadid opens up about her first date with Zayn Malik

author: USA TODAY
title: Gigi Hadid opens up about her first date with Zayn Malik
text:
Gigi Hadid opens up about her first date with Zayn Malik Kelly Lawler , USA TODAY 9:16 a.m. ET Feb. 10, 2017 24 Shares 
(Photo: Pascal Le Segretain, Getty Images) 
Gigi Hadid couldn't play it cool when it came to meeting beau Zayn Malik. 
The 21-year-old model makes her first appearance on The Ellen Show on Friday (one of her big Hollywood goals). And when you talk to Ellen you almost always end up gushing about your significant other. Hadid was more than happy to talk about her relationship with the former One Direction singer. 
The model explained how she met Malik, 24, at a friends birthday party about a year and a half ago. The meeting quickly turned into a date. 
"We played it cool for about 10 minutes," Hadid said. "Then I was like, 'You're really cute.'" 
"We connected really quickly," she added. "We kind of have the same sense of humor, and just started sharing videos." 
Hadid has publicly declared her affection for Malik before, with many photos on social media and even a note in June showing support after he was forced to cancel a show due to anxiety. 
"Your bravery in those times makes me proud," she wrote. "Love you and so proud of you always." 
Hadid also talked to DeGeneres about her new line, TommyXGigi, which she premiered Wednesday night at Tommy Hilfiger's extravagant show in Los Angeles . The items were available for purchase as soon as the show was over, and as DeGeneres helpfully informed Hadid, they've already sold out. Facebook Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Tommy Hilfiger repurposed L.A.'s Venice Boardwalk, transforming it into 'Tommyland,' a pop-up theme park that acted as the stage for his Spring 2017 collection and the newest TommyXGigi collab with supermodel Gigi Hadid. EUGENE GARCIA, EPA Lady Gaga attended the show wearing eye makeup reminiscent of her Super Bowl halftime show look. Jeff Kravitz, FilmMagic Newly solo singer Camila Cabello rocked a crop-top and high-waisted white jeans. Frederick M. Brown, Getty Images Sofia Richie donned a sleek, black ensemble with gold trim. Frederick M. Brown, Getty Images Strong contenders for the most gorgeous celebrity siblings, Presley Gerber, left, posed with his sis, Kaia Gerber. Joshua Blanchard, Getty Images for Tommy Hilfiger Corey Gamble's lady love, Kris Jenner, was all smiles. Frederick M. Charley Gallay, Getty Images for Tommy Hilfiger Singer Daya paired a geometric top with a denim miniskirt. Frederick M. Rich Polk, Getty Images for Tommy Hilfiger Singer Justine Skye donned a zip-up jacket over a top with metallic stripes.
